version_description:
• New: Apple Watch App.

If you discover any issues during or after the update, please contact me at support@madefm.com or @madeFM on Twitter.

If you like WorkTimes and have a minute, please leave a short review. This really helps a lot!

• Fixed: Existing user accounts were not transferred to the watch under some circumstances.

If you discover any issues during or after the update, please contact me at support@madefm.com or @madeFM on Twitter.

If you like WorkTimes and have a minute, please leave a short review. This really helps a lot!

• New: Say hello to WorkTimes on the iPad.
• New: Landscape support on the iPhone.
• New: If you have multiple user accounts you will now start in last used user account.
• New: Support for dynamic text sizes.

If you discover any issues during or after the update, please contact me at support@madefm.com or @madeFM on Twitter.

If you like WorkTimes and have a minute, please leave a short review. This really helps a lot!

• New: Show totals in export files
• New: Share export files to other apps and destinations like Dropbox
• Improved: Excel export layout
• Fixed: Labels overlap when increasing system font size

Please provide any feedback to support@madefm.com

• Minor bug fixes and improvements

Please provide any feedback to feedback@madefm.com

• New: Sort user accounts

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

Various improvements and issues

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Minor improvements and fixes

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Improve one hand operations on lager screens
• When starting, WorkTimes now automatically scrolls to today
• Some minor layout improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Fix: Annual leave records won't save

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Various fixes and improvements

Sollten während oder nach dem Update Probleme auftreten, melden Sie sich bitte bei mir unter feedback@systemweit.de.

• Various fixes and improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Various fixes and improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

NEW
• You can now clock-in and -out at a custom time

IMPROVED
• Syncing with watch app

• Fix the today button issue
• Fix bug that results in showing duration and time interval informationen for special days (holiday, illness, ...)

• New: You can now set a minutes interval and rounding method in your account settings
• Fixed: Some minor issues
• Fix displaying wrong minutes intervals in settings. Of course you can set the interval to 1-6, 10, 12, 15, 20 and 30 minutes.

• You can now import a backup file directly from within WorkTimes > Settings > Backup & Restore
• Some minor fixes and improvements

• Fixed: Swipe gesture to clock out clocks our the first, not the last record if multiple are available
• Fixed: Email capability not visible when creating a backup of the database
• Various improvements and fixes
• Various improvements and fixes
• NEW: Dark Mode support
• Improvements and fixes

• Export: You can now show the name of the working time model per record in a separate column. This is especially useful for shift work

• Various improvements and fixes

• Time Clock: WorkTimes now shows the estimated time to clock out.
• Watch App: Improved Insyncing
